oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Spiro-annulation via ring closing metathesis reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MANIVANNAN, E
GANESH, T
SREENIVASACHARY, N
DEB, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: organic-synthesis
allylation
metathesis
cyclopentane
spiro compounds
annulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various spiro cyclic systems are prepared from beta-di-carbonyl compounds and active methylene substrates via palladium catalyzed allylation and ring-closing metathesis (RCM) reaction as key steps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 11th Research Scholars Meeting of the Indian-Chemical-Society,MUMBAI, INDIA,JAN 08-09, 1999
